message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have a smaller share, but I'll give you a chance to reconsider the 50/50 split!
Not a good deal, I'll wait for a better offer!
A slight adjustment, but I'm still open to negotiations!
You're getting closer to the 50/50 split, but I'm not budging much yet!
Still too low, I'll keep pushing for a better deal!
Getting closer to the middle ground, let's meet here!
I'm making a stronger move, take it or leave it!
Too low, I'll keep pushing for a better deal!
Back to the original 50/50 split, let's meet in the middle!
